item.title: LeetCode 287.Find the Duplicate Number
item.description: test package main import ( "fmt" "math/rand" "time" ) type Moo struct { Cow int Sound string Tube chan bool } // A cow will moo until it is being fed func cow(num int, mootube chan Moo) { tube := make(chan bool) for { select { case mootube <- Moo{num, "moo", tube}: fmt.
